DOC.brief_summary: We hypothesize combination natural cycle IVF low dose gonadotropin injection combine In Vitro Maturation ( IVM ) ( Natural IVF/IVM ) viable option select population infertility patient tolerate exogenous gonadotropin risk ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: In Vitro Maturation ( IVM ) Human Oocytes
DOC.detailed_description: Natural IVF/IVM may attractive treatment alternative conventional control ovarian hyperstimulation ( COH ) /IVF treatment infertile woman particular select group . Natural IVF/IVM offer several advantage conventional COH protocol IVF include : 1 . Elimination need gonadotropin ovarian stimulation 2 . Elimination risk develop OHSS 3 . Simplification treatment , eliminate need frequent blood test ultrasound monitor 4 . Reduced cost treatment 5 . Avoiding potential side effect gonadotropin , include weight gain , bloating , breast tenderness , nausea , mood swing 6 . Eliminates concern potential risk malignancy may associate multiple cycle ovarian stimulation predispose population . This pilot study conduct assess clinical efficacy natural IVF/IVM
